sentences.en: If Earth's orbit were only 5 percent smaller than it is, temperatures during the early stages of Earth's history would have been high enough to vaporize the oceans.
sentences.cn: 如果地球的轨道比现在小5%，那么地球历史早期的温度就足以使海洋蒸发。

sentences.en: Heat from the sun could then vaporize the water each lunar noon.
sentences.cn: 之后来自太阳的热量在每个月球中午将这些水蒸发。

sentences.en: That is why heat can melt ice, vaporize water and cause bodies to expand.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么热能使冰融化，使水蒸发，使物体膨胀的原因。
